name: Tamadog
description:
Take your VIRTUAL puppy to the REAL world!

Any growing puppy needs lots of attention each and every moment, and yet taking care of your virtual pet in this AR game will be so much fun! Treat him to a plenty of different yummies, play lots of mini-games and walk him in your own neighborhood!

Enjoy these cute features with your Tamadog:

- TAKE CARE OF YOUR PUPPY IN REAL-LIFE SETTINGS: Allow the app to use phone camera and raise a dog right inside your house or apartment! MOBILE pet finally moves to your REAL home!

- RAISE A SMART PET: Record voice commands and train your dog! From “sit down” to “break dance” – you can teach your Tamadog lots of cute tricks!

- KEEP A RECORD OF FUNNY MOMENTS: Take cute selfies with your puppy, shoot hilarious videos and share them with your friends!

- UNLOCK NEW LEVELS: Keep raising a happy puppy, play with him and enjoy extra activities as a reward!

- CHOOSE ADORABLE OUTFITS: Smart suits for agile male pups and fancy dresses for fluffy girl puppies - dress your pet in the latest fashion!

- GET READY FOR CUTENESS OVERLOAD: Your new friend loves everything about you and goes head over heels when you rub his belly. Even more so, he will gladly lick your nose anytime you move the screen closer to him!

- NEED A BREAK? While your puppy is asleep or whenever you need to relax from the daily routine, sit back and set records in exciting mini-games! Find one to your own taste, but try them all: shooting bubbles is just as entertaining as healing and grooming your dog in diverse and enjoyable mini-games!

Subscription "VIP Items":
VIP Beds
VIP Food
VIP Toilets
VIP Toys

- Subscribe now with a trial period. After the 3 free days, your subscription will be automatically renewed, and a payment of $ 9.99 for the 1st month will be charged from your iTunes account.
- From then on the subscription will be automatically renewed every month, and the fee will be charged from your iTunes account upon confirmation of the purchase.
- The subscription will be renewed monthly until this feature is disabled by the user no later than 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle.

Subscription: Magic Mode:
Subscription lets you access the game and take care of your pet in AR mode.

- Get a subscription with a trial period. After 3 days of the free trial, your subscription will automatically renew and your iTunes account will be charged $ 4.99 for the first week. After that, the subscription will renew automatically every week and the fee will be charged to your iTunes account, once the purchase is confirmed.

- Your iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle, indicating the price of subscription renewal.
- The subscription is controlled by the user; its automatic renewal can be cancelled in the iTunes account settings. Cancellation within the current billing cycle is not possible.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication
